summary: This replaces the Steel Arrow mesh with the Iron Arrow mesh, and retexures it to go with the set forsworn leopard.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=\"5\"]Iron & Steel Arrows Leopard ![/size][/b][/center]


[b]> Description[/b]

This replaces the Steel Arrow mesh with the Iron Arrow mesh, and retexures it to go with the set [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=886]forsworn leopard by Rekicker[/url].

No texture increase (maybe later).


===========================================================
v1.0
Initial Release

===========================================================

[b]> My other mods[/b]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1391]Craftable Forsworn weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=889]Craftable Tools & Lokcpick[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2082]Firewood, Ore & Ingot weight reduction[/url]

===========================================================

Thank to Rekicker for his work on the Forsworn Leopard (look at it, it\'s awesome !)

===========================================================

Enjoy !


~Leezi
author: Leezi
